DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the efficacy, in terms of complete responses and overall survival, of inotuzumab ozogamicin versus investigator's choice of chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Inotuzumab Ozogamicin Versus Investigator's Choice Of Chemotherapy In Patients With Relapsed Or Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: CD22 expression Adequate liver and renal functions Isolated extramedullary disease Active Central Nervous System [CNS] disease
